languages.text: {n}Звонко щелкнув клешнями мехадендрита, Паскаль резко произносит:{/n} "Дух этой машины изъязвлен неведомым. Я чувствую это в его электромагнитном дыхании. Рекомендую немедленное очищение".

{n}With the pincers on his mechadendrites snapping loudly, Pasqal bites out,{/n} "The spirit of this machine has been wounded by something unknown. I sense it in its electromagnetic respiration. I recommend immediate purification."
languages.original_text: {n}Звонко щелкнув клешнями мехадендрита, Паскаль резко произносит:{/n} "Дух этой машины изъязвлен неведомым. Я чувствую это в его электромагнитном дыхании. Рекомендую немедленное очищение".

{n}With the pincers on his mechadendrites snapping loudly, Pasqal bites out,{/n} "The spirit of this machine has been wounded by something unknown. I sense it in its electromagnetic respiration. I recommend immediate purification."

languages.text: {n}機械触手のはさみを大きな音で鳴らしながらパスカルが口を挟んだ。{/n}「この機械の精霊は、未知の何かによって傷つけられている。電磁呼吸からそれが感じ取れる。直ちに浄化することをおすすめする」
languages.original_text: {n}With the pincers on his mechadendrites snapping loudly, Pasqal bites out,{/n} "The spirit of this machine has been wounded by something unknown. I sense it in its electromagnetic respiration. I recommend immediate purification."

traits.locale_text: {n}機械触手のはさみを大きな音で鳴らしながらパスカルが口を挟んだ。{/n}「この機械の精神は、未知の何かによって傷つけられている。電磁呼吸からそれが感じ取れる。直ちに浄化することをおすすめします」

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡机械触须上的钳子发出了响亮的咔嚓声。他咬着牙，开了口。{/n}“这台机器的机魂被某种未知的东西伤害了。我能感觉到它的电磁呼吸，我建议立即进行净化。”
languages.original_text: {n}With the pincers on his mechadendrites snapping loudly, Pasqal bites out,{/n} "The spirit of this machine has been wounded by something unknown. I sense it in its electromagnetic respiration. I recommend immediate purification."

traits.locale_text: {/n}帕斯卡机械触须上的钳子发出了响亮的咔嚓声。他咬着牙，开了口。{n}“这台机器的机魂被某种未知的东西伤害了。我能感觉到它的电磁呼吸，我建议立即进行净化。”

languages.text: {n}Chasqueando sonoramente las pinzas de sus mecadendritas, Pasqal masculla:{/n} «El espíritu de esta máquina ha sufrido heridas de origen desconocido. Lo noto en su respiración electromagnética. Recomiendo su purificación inmediata».
languages.original_text: {n}With the pincers on his mechadendrites snapping loudly, Pasqal bites out,{/n} "The spirit of this machine has been wounded by something unknown. I sense it in its electromagnetic respiration. I recommend immediate purification."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chasqueando sonoramente las pinzas de sus mecadendritas, Pasqal masculla:{/n} «El espíritu de esta máquina ha sufrido heridas de origen desconocido. Lo noto en su respiración electromagnética. Recomiendo su purificación inmediata».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal fait claquer bruyamment les pinces de ses mécadendrites et annonce d'un ton mordant :{/n} « L'esprit de cette machine a été blessé par quelque chose d'inconnu. Je le sens dans sa respiration électromagnétique. Je préconise une purification immédiate. »
languages.original_text: {n}With the pincers on his mechadendrites snapping loudly, Pasqal bites out,{/n} "The spirit of this machine has been wounded by something unknown. I sense it in its electromagnetic respiration. I recommend immediate purification."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal fait claquer bruyamment les pinces de ses mécadendrites et annonce d'un ton mordant :{/n} « L'esprit de cette machine a été blessé par quelque chose d'inconnu. Je le sens dans sa respiration électromagnétique. Je préconise une purification immédiate. »

languages.text: {n}Die Zangen an Pasqals Mechadendriten klappern laut, und er sagt gepresst:{/n} "Der Geist dieser Maschine wurde von etwas Unbekanntem verwundet. Ich spüre es in ihrer elektromagnetischen Atmung. Ich empfehle sofortige Reinigung."
languages.original_text: {n}With the pincers on his mechadendrites snapping loudly, Pasqal bites out,{/n} "The spirit of this machine has been wounded by something unknown. I sense it in its electromagnetic respiration. I recommend immediate purification."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Zangen an Pasqals Mechadendriten klappern laut, und er sagt gepresst:{/n} "Der Geist dieser Maschine wurde von etwas Unbekanntem verwundet. Ich spüre es in ihrer elektromagnetischen Atmung. Ich empfehle sofortige Reinigung."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, mekadentritlerindeki kıskaçları gürültüyle takırdatarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu makinenin ruhu, bilinmeyen bir şey tarafından yaralanmış. Bunu elektromanyetik soluklarında hissedebiliyorum. Bir an önce arındırılmasını öneriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}With the pincers on his mechadendrites snapping loudly, Pasqal bites out,{/n} "The spirit of this machine has been wounded by something unknown. I sense it in its electromagnetic respiration. I recommend immediate purification."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekadentritlerindeki kıskaçları gürültüyle takırdatan Paskal:{/n} "Bu makinenin ruhu bilinmeyen bir şey tarafından yaralanmış. Bunu elektromanyetik solunumlarında hissedebiliyorum. Bir an önce arındırılmasını öneriyorum."
